seniority_level.evidence: 5-7 years of BPM experience required, which aligns with senior level expectations

job_family.evidence: This is a BPM (Business Process Management) developer role, not a traditional data engineering role. The job focuses on process automation tools like Appian, IBM BPM, Pega, and Camunda rather than data engineering responsibilities.

sub_specialty.evidence: Role involves integrating BPM solutions with enterprise systems via APIs and web services, with ERP and CRM integration requirements

leadership_expectation.evidence: Role focuses on collaboration with teams and stakeholders but no mention of direct reports, mentoring, or leadership responsibilities

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP) mentioned in job description

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all

processing_paradigm.evidence: Job description explicitly mentions 'both batch and real-time processing' capabilities

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools (Airflow, Spark, dbt, etc.) mentioned in requirements

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions database concepts and SQL databases (Oracle, MySQL) but no specific data warehouse or lake technologies

remote_restriction.evidence: Onsite work model required in Bengaluru East, Karnataka, India - specific regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: Location specified as Bengaluru East, Karnataka, India - single country requirement

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite requirement suggests need to already be in Bengaluru area rather than relocation package

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and role is India-based where H1B doesn't apply

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: India-based role where OPT/CPT student visa programs don't apply

citizenship_required.evidence: No specific citizenship requirements mentioned, standard work authorization implied

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employment type stated, indicating employee (W2) rather than contractor arrangement

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, compensation, or perks mentioned in job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career growth, advancement opportunities, or development paths mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs or working with senior staff mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, paths, or advancement opportunities mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear minimum experience requirements (5+ years), specific technical skills listed as must-haves, and Master's degree required

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined BPM developer role with specific tools (Appian, IBM BPM, Pega, Camunda) and clear responsibilities around process automation

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 5-7 years experience requirement for BPM role with relevant technical skills is reasonable and appropriate for seniority level
